<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Description: This pass finds Load Value Injection (LVI) gadgets consisting</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// of a load from memory (i.e., SOURCE), and any operation that may transmit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the value loaded from memory over a covert channel, or use the value loaded</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// from memory to determine a branch/call target (i.e., SINK). After finding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// all such gadgets in a given function, the pass minimally inserts LFENCE</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instructions in such a manner that the following property is satisfied: for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// all SOURCE+SINK pairs, all paths in the CFG from SOURCE to SINK contain at</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// least one LFENCE instruction. The algorithm that implements this minimal</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// insertion is influenced by an academic paper that minimally inserts memory</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// fences for high-performance concurrent programs:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///         http://www.cs.ucr.edu/~lesani/companion/oopsla15/OOPSLA15.pdf</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The algorithm implemented in this pass is as follows:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 1 Build a condensed CFG (i.e., a GadgetGraph) consisting only of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// following components:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    - SOURCE instructions (also includes function arguments)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    - SINK instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    - Basic block entry points</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    - Basic block terminators</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///    - LFENCE instructions</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 2 Analyze the GadgetGraph to determine which SOURCE+SINK pairs (i.e.,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// gadgets) are already mitigated by existing LFENCEs. If all gadgets have been</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// mitigated, go to step 6</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 3 Use a heuristic or plugin to approximate minimal LFENCE insertion.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 4 Insert one LFENCE along each CFG edge that was cut in step 3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 5 Go to step 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// 6 If any LFENCEs were inserted, return &#96;true&#96; from runOnMachineFunction()</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to tell LLVM that the function was modified.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/immutablegraph-h">ImmutableGraph.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86-h">X86.h</a>&quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106" lineLink="#a06f818ee2e01166c35a3bd261162db05"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">typedef</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> int (&#42;<a href="#a06f818ee2e01166c35a3bd261162db05">OptimizeCutT</a>)(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Nodes, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NodesSize,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109" lineLink="#aafe950ec2bddc0ff1e8e39168d789ae2"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#a06f818ee2e01166c35a3bd261162db05">OptimizeCutT</a> <a href="#aafe950ec2bddc0ff1e8e39168d789ae2">OptimizeCut</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;DefTransmitters = Transmitters&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#a10793004faece2bb74d3363b5f6ce96f">Def</a>.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/rdf/nodeaddr/#a7e398d2285d22a33c3358ed7904725d7">Id</a>&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Remove duplicate transmitters</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">    AnalyzeDefUseChain(SourceDef);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;SourceDefTransmitters = Transmitters&#91;SourceDef.Id&#93;;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TransmitterId : SourceDefTransmitters) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Returns the number of remaining gadget edges that could not be eliminated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> X86LoadValueInjectionLoadHardeningPass::elimMitigatedEdgesAndNodes(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> X86LoadValueInjectionLoadHardeningPass::hardenLoadsWithHeuristic(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF, std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;MachineGadgetGraph&gt; Graph)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If &#96;MF&#96; does not have any fences, then no gadgets would have been</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mitigated at this point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Graph-&gt;NumFences &gt; 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Eliminating mitigated paths...\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Graph = trimMitigatedEdges(std::move(Graph));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Eliminating mitigated paths... <Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Graph-&gt;NumGadgets == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Cutting edges...\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><span class="doxyHighlight">  EdgeSet CutEdges&#123;&#42;Graph&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Begin by collecting all ingress CFG edges for each node</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;const Node &#42;, SmallVector&lt;const Edge &#42;, 2&gt;</a>&gt; IngressEdgeMap;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Edge &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> : Graph-&gt;edges())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-x86loadvalueinjectionloadhardening-cpp-/machinegadgetgraph/#adcd1c9400c9fb71f6417dfaefb71c6c6">MachineGadgetGraph::isCFGEdge</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><span class="doxyHighlight">      IngressEdgeMap&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>.getDest()&#93;.push&#95;back(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For each gadget edge, make cuts that guarantee the gadget will be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mitigated. A computationally efficient way to achieve this is to either:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (a) cut all egress CFG edges from the gadget source, or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (b) cut all ingress CFG edges to the gadget sink.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Moreover, the algorithm tries not to make a cut into a loop by preferring</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to make a (b)-type cut if the gadget source resides at a greater loop depth</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// than the gadget sink, or an (a)-type cut otherwise.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> : Graph-&gt;nodes()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Edge &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>.edges()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-x86loadvalueinjectionloadhardening-cpp-/machinegadgetgraph/#a72d45b3ad4bd84e88d5792e119e858e0">MachineGadgetGraph::isGadgetEdge</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;const Edge &#42;, 2&gt;</a> EgressEdges;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;const Edge &#42;, 2&gt;</a> &amp;IngressEdges = IngressEdgeMap&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>.getDest()&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Edge &amp;EgressEdge : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>.edges())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-x86loadvalueinjectionloadhardening-cpp-/machinegadgetgraph/#adcd1c9400c9fb71f6417dfaefb71c6c6">MachineGadgetGraph::isCFGEdge</a>(EgressEdge))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><span class="doxyHighlight">          EgressEdges.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(&amp;EgressEdge);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> EgressCutCost = 0, IngressCutCost = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Edge &#42;EgressEdge : EgressEdges)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CutEdges.contains(&#42;EgressEdge))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><span class="doxyHighlight">          EgressCutCost += EgressEdge-&gt;getValue();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Edge &#42;IngressEdge : IngressEdges)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!CutEdges.contains(&#42;IngressEdge))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlight">          IngressCutCost += IngressEdge-&gt;getValue();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;EdgesToCut =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><span class="doxyHighlight">          IngressCutCost &lt; EgressCutCost ? IngressEdges : EgressEdges;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Edge &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> : EdgesToCut)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><span class="doxyHighlight">        CutEdges.insert(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Cutting edges... <Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> X86LoadValueInjectionLoadHardeningPass::insertFences(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF, <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-x86loadvalueinjectionloadhardening-cpp-/machinegadgetgraph/#a360c3c9b038c24a6b36eff6bdadc63fb">MachineGadgetGraph</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ad96b7cf3182ce2ba85e5a7a93b12c441">G</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><span class="doxyHighlight">    EdgeSet &amp;CutEdges </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42; in, out &#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FencesInserted = 0;</span></CodeLine>
